data.actual_result: Nothing happens if you touch the button. Probably works, but you don't know if the channel is NSFW or not.
data.expected_result: If the channel is a NSFW one the box should be checked
data.short_description: NSFW Button Doesn't Work. The button used to make a channel nsfw or not does not work. It doesn't show if the box is briefed or not.
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to a channel - Go to channel settings tab - Scroll down to NSFW button - Press the button  - Observe: no changes has been made at the checking box
